title: MAAP ALT_Road Collection helps take the road less traveled w/ durable, modular apparel
content:
Melbourne-based MAAP has been releasing new apparel faster than we can keep up. From collaborations with 100% and New Era to complete new collections like their Training kit, MAAP is showing no signs of slowing down. Most recently, MAAP took on the world of gravel, all-road, and adventure riding with their appropriately named Alt_Road Collectionâ€”which

The post MAAP ALT_Road Collection helps take the road less traveled w/ durable, modular apparel appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Zach Overholt
